channel.title: trigger_gravity not working in Alien Swarm
channel.description:
I want to add a space sequence to my Alien Swarm map using a [i]trigger_gravity[/i], unfortunately it doesn't work. Neither the players nor physics objects are affected (yes I've set the proper flags).
Does this work at all or am I doing something wrong?

item.title: trigger_gravity not working in Alien Swarm
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
I got it working now using a trigger_vphysics_motion

Unfortunately only physics objects are affected, not the players/aliens or any gibs.

Read full topic
item.source: trigger_gravity not working in Alien Swarm
